verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> I saw <S%G3708><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> at the four <S%G5064><s%> corners <S%G1137><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> holding <S%G2902><s%> back <S%G2902><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> winds <S%G417><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that no <S%G3361><s%> wind <S%G417><s%> should blow <S%G4154><s%> on the earth <S%G1093><s%> or <S%G3383><s%> on the sea <S%G2281><s%> or <S%G3383><s%> on any <S%G3956><s%> tree. <S%G1186><s%>

And I saw <S%G3708><s%> another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> ascending <S%G305><s%> from the rising <S%G395><s%> of the sun, <S%G2246><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> the seal <S%G4973><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> and he cried <S%G2896><s%> out with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> to the four <S%G5064><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> it was granted <S%G1325><s%> to harm <S%G91><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> and the sea, <S%G2281><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Do not harm <S%G91><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> or <S%G3383><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> or <S%G3383><s%> the trees, <S%G1186><s%> until <S%G891><s%> we have sealed <S%G4972><s%> the bond-servants of our God <S%G2316><s%> on their foreheads. <S%G3359><s%>"

And I heard <S%G191><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who were sealed, <S%G4972><s%> one <S%G1540><s%> hundred <S%G1540><s%> and forty-four thousand <S%G5505><s%> sealed <S%G4972><s%> from every <S%G3956><s%> tribe <S%G5443><s%> of the sons <S%G5207><s%> of Israel: <S%G2474><s%>

from the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Judah, <S%G2455><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%> [were] sealed, <S%G4972><s%> from the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Reuben <S%G4502><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> from the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Gad <S%G1045><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%>

from the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Asher <S%G768><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> from the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Naphtali <S%G3508><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> from the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Manasseh <S%G3128><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%>

from the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Simeon <S%G4826><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> from the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Levi <S%G3017><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> from the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Issachar <S%G7096><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%>

from the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Zebulun <S%G2194><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> from the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Joseph <S%G2501><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> from the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Benjamin, <S%G958><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%> [were] sealed. <S%G4972><s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> I looked, <S%G3708><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude, <S%G3793><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> count, <S%G705><s%> from every <S%G3956><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> and [all] tribes <S%G5443><s%> and peoples <S%G2992><s%> and tongues, <S%G1100><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> and before <S%G1799><s%> the Lamb, <S%G721><s%> clothed <S%G4016><s%> in white <S%G3022><s%> robes, <S%G4749><s%> and palm <S%G5404><s%> branches <S%G5404><s%> [were] in their hands; <S%G5495><s%>

and they cry <S%G2896><s%> out with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Salvation <S%G4991><s%> to our God <S%G2316><s%> who sits <S%G2521><s%> on the throne, <S%G2362><s%> and to the Lamb. <S%G721><s%>"

And all <S%G3956><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> were standing <S%G2476><s%> around <S%G2945><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> and [around] the elders <S%G4245><s%> and the four <S%G5064><s%> living <S%G2226><s%> creatures; <S%G2226><s%> and they fell <S%G4098><s%> on their faces <S%G4383><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> and worshiped <S%G4352><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Amen, <S%G281><s%> blessing <S%G2129><s%> and glory <S%G1391><s%> and wisdom <S%G4678><s%> and thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> and honor <S%G5092><s%> and power <S%G1411><s%> and might, <S%G2479><s%> [be] to our God <S%G2316><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>"

And one <S%G1520><s%> of the elders <S%G4245><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to me, "These <S%G3778><s%> who are clothed <S%G4016><s%> in the white <S%G3022><s%> robes, <S%G4749><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> are they, and from where <S%G4159><s%> have they come <S%G2064><s%>?"

And I said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "My lord, <S%G2962><s%> you know. <S%G3609><s%>" And he said <S%G3004><s%> to me, "These <S%G3778><s%> are the ones who come <S%G2064><s%> out of the great <S%G3173><s%> tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> and they have washed <S%G4150><s%> their robes <S%G4749><s%> and made <S%G3021><s%> them white <S%G3021><s%> in the blood <S%G129><s%> of the Lamb. <S%G721><s%>

"For this <S%G3778><s%> reason, <S%G1223><s%> they are before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> and they serve <S%G3000><s%> Him day <S%G2250><s%> and night <S%G3571><s%> in His temple; <S%G3485><s%> and He who sits <S%G2521><s%> on the throne <S%G2362><s%> shall spread <S%G4637><s%> His tabernacle <S%G4637><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them.

"They shall hunger <S%G3983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> more, <S%G2089><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> thirst <S%G1372><s%> anymore; <S%G2089><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> shall the sun <S%G2246><s%> beat <S%G4098><s%> down <S%G4098><s%> on them, nor <S%G3761><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> heat; <S%G2738><s%>

for the Lamb <S%G721><s%> in the center <S%G3319><s%> of the throne <S%G2362><s%> shall be their shepherd, <S%G4165><s%> and shall guide <S%G3594><s%> them to springs <S%G4077><s%> of the water <S%G5204><s%> of life; <S%G2222><s%> and God <S%G2316><s%> shall wipe <S%G1813><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> tear <S%G1144><s%> from their eyes. <S%G3788><s%> "
